author: Schulte, Paul
title: The Next Revolution in our Credit-Driven Economy
text: E-Books are also available on all known E-Book shops. Short description The Next Revolution in our Credit-Driven Economy integrates market theory and practice to help investors identify growth opportunities, and to help regulators create a sustainable economic environment. By unbundling how credit markets work, this authoritative guide provides insight into crisis avoidance and detection, successful investment climates, and the groundwork that must be in place for policy makers to build a sound basis for economic growth. Clear, succinct case studies provide examples of policy's effects on economic stability, giving you a stronger understanding of the network of forces that determine how loan/deposit ratios behave around the world.* Dive deep into the mechanisms underlying the credit markets* Learn how unregulated borrowing leads to socioeconomic crises* Examine real-world policy options through global case studies* Discover how credit rises are best detected and avoidedThe Next Revolution in our Credit-Driven Economy gives you a more informed look at where the world needs to begin changing.
